mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM(SELECT SHOP_NO, SHOP_NAME, SHOP_INTRO, SHOP_ORIGIN, SHOP_RENAME, ROUND(AVG(NVL(REVIEW_SCORE, 0)), 1) AS AVG_SCORE FROM SHOP_INFO FULL OUTER JOIN SHOP_REVIEW USING(SHOP_NO) GROUP BY SHOP_NO, SHOP_NAME, SHOP_INTRO, SHOP_ORIGIN, SHOP_RENAME ORDER BY AVG_SCORE DESC)

SELECT SHOP_NO, SHOP_NAME, SHOP_INTRO, SHOP_ORIGIN, SHOP_RENAME, ROUND(AVG(NVL(REVIEW_SCORE, 0)), 1) AS AVG_SCORE FROM SHOP_INFO FULL OUTER JOIN (SELECT * FROM SHOP_REVIEW WHERE REVIEW_STATUS = 'Y') USING(SHOP_NO) GROUP BY SHOP_NO, SHOP_NAME, SHOP_INTRO, SHOP_ORIGIN, SHOP_RENAME ORDER BY AVG_SCORE DESC
